description: The SoftwareInventory resource describes the inventory of software or firmware components.

Manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or producer of this software.
Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall represent the name of the manufacturer or producer of this software.

RelatedItem.description: The IDs of the Resources associated with this software inventory item.
RelatedItem.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of IDs for pointers consistent with JSON Pointer syntax to the Resource that is associated with this software inventory item.

SoftwareId.description: The implementation-specific label that identifies this software.
SoftwareId.longDescription: This property shall represent an implementation-specific label that identifies this software.  This string correlates with a component repository or database.

Updateable.description: This is true if the item is updatable.

title: #SoftwareInventory.v1_2_0.SoftwareInventory
